offer_free_returns.description: If true, the merchant offers free returns to customers

carrier.description:
The carrier the merchant uses for returns

            #Logic
            * Only used when offer_free_returns = true

account_number.description:
The carrier account that Jet can charge if the merchant provide free returns to its customers

            #Logic
            * Only used when offer_free_returns = true

zip_code.description:
The zip code associated with the carrier account

            #Logic
            * Only used when offer_free_returns = true
